mapper.sql: ID, PatientID, EquipmentID, TestingTime, SystolicPressure, DiastolicPressure, PulseRate, HeartRate, Remark, CreatedOn, `State`
mapper.select: SELECT blood.shrink AS shrink, blood.diastole AS diastole, blood.pulseRate AS pulseRate, blood.bloodTakeTime AS bloodTakeTime, bloodalert.shrinkAlert AS shrinkAlert, bloodalert.diastoleAlert AS diastoleAlert, bloodalert.bloodTakeTimeAlert AS bloodTakeTimeAlert, heart.heartRate AS heartRate, heart.heartTakeTime AS heartTakeTime, heartalert.heartRateAlert AS heartRateAlert, heartalert.heartTakeTimeAlert AS heartTakeTimeAlert FROM ( SELECT TOP 1 SystolicPressure AS shrink, DiastolicPressure AS diastole, PulseRate AS pulseRate, TestingTime AS bloodTakeTime, PatientID AS patientID FROM BloodPressureHistory WHERE PatientID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY TestingTime DESC ) blood FULL OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TOP 1 SystolicPressure AS shrinkAlert, DiastolicPressure AS diastoleAlert, TestingTime AS bloodTakeTimeAlert, PatientID AS patientID FROM BloodPressureHistory WHERE PatientID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND State = 'Danger' ORDER BY TestingTime DESC ) bloodalert ON blood.patientID = bloodalert.patientID FULL OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TOP 1 HeartRate AS heartRate, TestingTime AS heartTakeTime, PatientID AS patientID FROM ElectrocardioHistory WHERE PatientID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY TestingTime DESC ) heart ON blood.patientID = heart.patientID FULL OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TOP 1 HeartRate AS heartRateAlert, TestingTime AS heartTakeTimeAlert, PatientID AS patientID FROM ElectrocardioHistory WHERE PatientID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND State = 'Danger' ORDER BY TestingTime DESC ) heartalert ON blood.patientID = heartalert.patientID
